projects.title: Semi-automatic machine for milling aluminum and PVC welds
projects.description: In order to respond to a competitive and increasingly demanding on two important fronts these being the quality and delivery time, it becomes necessary to modify the company's strategies successively so that he could best respond to market demands and ensure survival of the company. Therefore, this project and being framed in the field of metalworking, studied a automated device that could replace a traditional manufacturing stage as the grinding of welds, taking as an example aluminum frame suitable for mounting on wood systems windows in wood-aluminum, which after passing through the phase welding need pass by grinding, this is a lengthy process and expensive failures. With this equipment we can thus obtain products with higher quality and lower lead times.
